posts.text: Matatandaan sa nakaraang senate hearing sinabi ni  Ellen Tordesillas ng Vera Files na si dating pangulong Rodrigo Duterte umano numero unong nagkakalat ng mga fake news.
A BOMB SHELL on Ellen Tordesillas of
'SOURCE OF FALSEHOOD' | Tinabla ni PCOO Sec. Andanar ang sinabi ni veteran journalist Ellen Tordesillas na si Pres. Duterte ang no. 1 source ng fake news. FULL STORY:
Ayon sa journalist na si Ellen Tordesillas, isa sa mga nakikita niyang problema sa isyu ng fake news ay mismong mga opisyal pa raw ng gobyerno ang nagpapakalat ng kasinungalingan.

'HINDI AKO HUMINGI' | Nilinaw ng beteranong journalist na si Ellen Tordesillas na wala na siyang cancer simula pa noong 2003 taliwas sa pahayag ni Pangulong Duterte. Itinanggi rin ni Tordesillas na nanghihingi siya ng pera para ipagamot ang kanyang karamdaman. Tinulungan daw siya ng dalawang senador at ng kanyang dating publisher.

Alert | VERA Files receives death threats after fact check VERA Files has received death threats over Facebook Messenger, including a photo of two men holding assault rifles and the message "you wanna die?" According to VERA Files president Ellen Tordesillas, the series of messages from Facebook user "Melbert Abarquez" came after a fact check on a statement by Sen. Ronald Dela Rosa that recent comments by former President Rodrigo Duterte about killing police officers involv…

Kakaiba nga ang Senado ngayon. Panoorin nyo:

More than half of Filipinos (54%) have been tuning out news by checking it less often, including disabling notifications. Half avoid certain sources, scrolling past news or changing channels when news comes on. More than a fourth (28%) shun specific news topics like those that dampen their mood or increase anxiety.
